events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and are excited to review your credentials and experience in detail.
The application has been categorised under engineering roles due to your background and skills related to software development.
A technical recruiter has been assigned to your candidacy to guide you through the next steps of our hiring process for the developer role.
Your profile has passed the initial screening stage; the recruiting team was impressed with your software development experience and technical skills.
We appreciate your prompt response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been successfully scheduled for May 20th, where you will discuss your engineering projects and solve coding challenges.
The technical interview was completed, and the feedback highlighted your strong problem-solving skills and knowledge of software architecture.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your fit within the company culture and to review benefits and other employment details.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team and contributing to upcoming projects.
We have sent you a formal job offer for the software engineer position including salary details, benefits, and other related information.
Thank you for providing your feedback and asking clarifying questions regarding the offer and role responsibilities.
We are pleased to confirm that you have accepted the job offer and are looking forward to welcoming you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started; welcome sessions and technical setup are scheduled to ensure a smooth transition into your new role.
The hiring case is now closed as you have onboarded successfully and integrated well within the engineering team.
